p: We performed silencing experiments to investigate more specifically the function of Hsp70 expression in PEDV replication. We designed three siRNAs, siRNA1, siRNA2, siRNA3, and a negative control siRNA (siRNA NC) targeting the Hsp70 gene. SiRNA2 had no inhibited effect, while siRNA 1 and siRNA3 had significantly inhibited Hsp70 mRNA and protein levels compared to scramble siRNA ( Figure 3A,B). SiRNA1 and siRNA3 were used to investigate the relationship between Hsp70 synthesis and PEDV replication. Twenty-four hours post siRNAs transfection, cells were infected with PEDV at 1 MOI. Under these conditions, the knockdown of Hsp70 expression was associated with a significant reduction of the amounts of viral mRNA and protein levels ( Figure 3C,D). These results confirmed that the specific inhibition of Hsp70 synthesis led to a reduction of viral RNA and protein levels, suggesting Hsp70 was involved in the viral transcription and translation during PEDV replication.
